bill_title: to require the Department of Labor to conduct certain studies regarding workersÆ compensation.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Department of Labor to conduct certain studies regarding workers' compensation. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Labor shall meet with the North Dakota Workers' Compensation Bureau and shall jointly study and identify opportunities for the development and use by the two states of information systems and data tracking systems pertaining to workers' compensation. The department shall report its findings and recommendations to the 1998 Legislature. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
